divs: Sighting DetailsMUFON, I HAVE A NUMBER OF UFO ENCOUNTERS,LOOKING FOR A SURGEON WHO BELIEVES IN UFO ABDUCTIONS TO INVESTIGATE TWO SCARS OF UNKNOWN ORIGIN,HE SHOULD BE IN CT.-----PRIVACY IS EXTREMELY IMPORTANT!!!! I AM WELL READ ABOUT THESE MATTERS---JACQUES VALLEE,HYNEK,HOPKINS,STRIEBER,ETC.---I AM CERTAINLY A BELIEVER IN ALIEN ABDUCTION BUT I UNDERSTAND IT IS A SUBJECT OF RIDICULE AND GOVERNMENT SNOOPING. CONTACT ME VIA USPS MAIL AND WE CAN SET UP AN APPT. TO MEET. DAVID ZENO 40 BROAD STREET,APT.1206 MIDDLETOWN,CT.06457
